#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector<vi >
#define pp pair<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ppl pair<ll,ll>
#define vl vector<ll>
#define vll vector<vl >
#define llu unsigned ll
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define mod 1000000007
#define sc scanf
#define pf printf
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(!b)
		return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	ll temp=power(a,b/2);
	temp=(temp*temp);
	if(b&1)
		temp=(temp*a);
	return temp;
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,i,s,j,ans=0,val;
    sc("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
		ans=0;
		sc("%d",&n);
		vi v(n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			sc("%d",&(v[i]));
		sc("%d",&(s));
		sort(all(v));
		vi::iterator it;
		for(i=0;i<n-2;i++)
		{
			for(j=i+1;j<n-1;j++)
			{
				val=v[i]+v[j];
				if(val>=s)
					break;
				it=lower_bound(v.begin()+j+1,v.end(),s-val);
				it--;
				ans+=(it)-(v.begin()+j);
			}
		}
		pf("%d\n",ans);
	}
    //cin>>n;
    return 0;
}
